getDataAsset(bytes32).details: Function in charge of inserting a Data Asset on SC
getDataAsset(bytes32).return: _dataAssetProducerID Address of the Data Producer_dataAssetAccessType :Type of access {free, paying}_dataAssetAccessPrice :Price in Ether set by the Data Producer to access the Data Asset, if paying one_dataAssetAccessDuration :Duration of the access in number of days_proofOfIntegrigyDataAsset :Hash of the DataAssetValue_proofOfSourceAuthenticity :Address of the dataAssetProducerID, Etherum address_proofOfIntegrityUseProcessingCondictions :Hash of Use and Processing Conditions of the data Asset

insertDataAsset(address,uint8,string,str.details: Function in charge of inserting a Data Asset on SC

params._dataAssetAccessDuration: Duration of the access in number of days
params._dataAssetAccessPrice: Price in Ether set by the Data Producer to access the Data Asset, if paying one
params._proofOfIntegrityUseProcessingConditions: Hash of Use and Processing Conditions of the data Asset
params._proofOfSourceAuthenticity: Address of the dataAssetProducerID, Etherum address
